calculateCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool.details: For calls: max loss is (amount * currentPrice) - limited by premium receivedFor puts: max loss is (amount * strikePrice)

params._ethUsdPriceId: Pyth price feed ID for ETH/USD

params.isCall: true for call option, false for put

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (6 decimals)

params.optionId: ID of the option to dispute
params.pythPriceUpdate: New Pyth price update as evidence

params.optionId: ID of the option to exercise
ID of the option to finalize

params.partyB: The other party in the channel

params.optionId: ID of the option to purchase

params.nonce: State nonce (must be higher than current)

withdraw(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Used for state channel withdrawals - requires signature from user

calculateCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool.notice: Calculate required collateral for an option

calculatePayout((bytes32,address,address.notice: Calculate payout for an exercised option

createOption(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Create a new option (writer lists for sale)

finalizeChannel(bytes32).notice: Finalize a channel after challenge period

finalizeSettlement(bytes32).notice: Finalize a settlement after challenge period

getEthUsdPrice().notice: Get current ETH/USD price from Pyth

openChannel(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Open a state channel between two parties

updateChannelState(bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Submit a state update with both signatures

withdrawDirect(uint256).notice: Direct withdrawal without signature (for simple cases)

withdrawEth().notice: Withdraw ETH sent for Pyth updates
